alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 8:47PM CST until January 09 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 9 inches, with localized amounts over 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central, and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult because of blowing snow and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the and Monday evening commute, and could impact the Tuesday morning commute as well. Gusty winds could also bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be out of the east and relatively light for most of the day on Monday, before switching to the north and increasing late Monday afternoon through Monday night. Blowing and drifting snow will continue into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
